## Installation

You can install the released version of ARTofR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Hzhang-ouce/ARTofR")
```
## COMMON WORKFLOW OF THIS PACKAGE

1. type your text in any text editor
2. copy your text
3. call xxx_box() or xxx_box1() etc in R console
4. Check the output in console, NO NEED to copy them
5. paste into your R script

Read [instruction_page.pdf](https://github.com/Hzhang-ouce/ARTofR/blob/master/instruction_page.pdf) for more information
